summary: Skip the tour at the College of Winterhold
descriptionHtml:
A very simple mod that simply adds an extra dialog option for Mirabelle Ervine, which gives you the option of skipping her tour of the College of Winterhold when you first arrive there.

Update: It's been brought to my attention that you can just start the tour and run inside to skip it. I honestly had no idea. ;) So I guess this just lets you do that more politely.
author: cruinh
